snippet: English Heritage said that because of budget cuts it had removed the names of Graham Chapman, Brian Epstein, Vladimir Nabokov and Jacqueline du Pré, among others, from a list of famous figures whose homes were to be marked with special plaques.
abstract: English Heritage said that because of budget cuts it had removed the names of Graham Chapman, Brian Epstein, Vladimir Nabokov and Jacqueline du Pré, among others, from a list of famous figures whose homes were to be marked with special plaques.

headline.main: Not Cool, Britannia: Plans Are Dropped to Honor Homes of Some Great Britons
headline.print_headline: Budget Cuts Thwart English Heritage Plan
